overview: “My neighbor is an ordinary person. But after all, if you observe a person long enough, he will cease to be simple, ordinary. ” The film was shot from the window of director's apartment for several years. He filmed a neighbor and his favorite old car - a friend, a creature to which he was infinitely attached. But in the end, the movie suddenly turned out not about a particular person, but about life in general.
title: Junker
